content.detailedDescription:
I am hesitant to report these events but i have been unable to come up with a suitable explanation for what happened. i feel i need to tell someone and this seems to be the best way to do so. 

it was a cold but extemely clear january evening (i think around 8pm but i cannot be sure). i had been helping a friend move into their new home to the south of the town and had been there since 1pm. that night i decided to walk home as the sky was clear and it was just a short 1.5 mile walk down a couple of main roads and across a couple of fields. i set off around 7:30 and got most of the way home without incident. however as i hopped over the stile into the first field i noticed a strange silence, as though someone had put cotton wool in my ears. unpeturbed i continued on my way towards a solitary tree in the distance (which i had to pass before making the right turn towards home). as i approached the tree i noticed some movement and scuffling at its base. at first i thought this must be the sheep in the field but as i got closer still i could smell a strong ammonia like odour and the movement was certainly not sheep as the sheep were moving at the opposite side of the field in a large group. as i turned back towards the tree a feeling of dread enveloped me as three strange creatures stood perfectly still in front of the tree and stared straight at me. i stood paralysed by the creatures stare, which seemed to penetrate every inch of my soul. their eyes were large with a dull iris of white flecks. the rest of their bodies were small, about 3-4ft, i couldnt make much out in the dark but their bodies seemed atrophied in favour of those eyes. i had an intense feeling of fear and i was certain the creatures were malevolant i continued to stand, dumbfounded when one of the creatures lunged forward making an unearthly hissing sound. at this point i turned and ran, not looking back as i was so afraid i would see the creature catching up. once i got back to the main road i heard a low humming sound which is when i looked up and saw a large v shaped object fly overhead. i cannot be sure if it was connected to the creatures but once it had disappeared i felt much better. i continued my journey home, albeit sticking to the well lit roads. i reached home at 10pm, which surprised me as the journey should have taken less than 45 minutes. to this day i am still haunted by the eyes of those entities and have never told anyone of my experiences until now.

thank you for listening.
content.summary: Sighting of unnerving group of entities followed by ufo

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving northbound i5 to eastbound 76 i saw a large triangle glowing red above the clouds. the object was very large and took up a large portion of the sky. it had to be at least a mile in size. after getting home i looked in the direction of the object and could still see the faint glow and a random rapid flashing like lighning to the right but no thunder. this was also witnessed by my passenger.
content.summary: Glowing red triangle over camp pendleton marine corp base

content.detailedDescription:
I live and was in north atlanta (buckhead) ga. when this event took place.
i was looking in the direction of a neighboring county, cobb, specifically 
at an area where dobbins airforce base is located.
i had been star gazing for a couple of hours with a friend of mine named chris.
around 4:00 a.M. or so, i turned to my right to move the telescope to a different area of
my terrace. upon  turning to my right, i immediately noticed a very bright roundish object that seemed to be emitting different colors almost in a sort of loop pattern. the position of this object in relation to the horizon and area of the sky was nothing but an anomaly. i quickly grabbed my binoculars to view this object. this object was not very far above the horizon which led me to believe it was not very high in the sky. as i began to look at this thing, it began to move to the right. the object then stopped again for a second and then moved upwards at an unusual rate of speed and then became still and then moving very swiftly to the right. these movement clearly were not those of anything that i am aware of and confirmed my suspicion that i might be viewing a u.F.O. at this point, i called for my buddy rob to come check this out. he was a few yards behind me. i asked him again to hurry up and look at this thing. at the moment chris turned around and made visual contact with this object, it instantly vanished. the lights went out and i want to say it seemed to have vanished in an upwardly fashion but i honestly can't confirm this because of how fast it disappeared. i asked him if he saw anything and replied yes and what the hell was that.
he says he saw a bright ball for a half second disappear into thin air.
my next statement is probably unrelated but i feel it should be mentioned. around an hour after this incident while standing on a different terrace, my friend and i witnessed two separate shooting stars both strangely either with the same trajectory or very close. the second "shooting star" appeared to have left a cloud trail where the end looked like a half circle shape. we both agreed that these meteors were unusual in how quick and bright they were. the location of this shooting stars were not near the u.F.O. sighting.
also, a few days prior to this incident, i spotted a bright round object in the sky that was emitting multi colors similar to this one. however, i presumed it was a bright star or planet but was compelled to run inside to grab a camera to take a picture. upon returning from inside, the object was gone. i was absolutely stumped on how this planet or star could have just vanished. it was on my mind even the next day. i mention this prior sighting because i'm wondering if this object was the same or similar to the recent sighting. the position however in the sky was almost opposite from each other. basically, a difference of around 180 degrees of difference now that i think of it.
 this sighting made me feel very exited and i remember while watching the craft or object an internal sense of something. i can't explain this feeling really. it was not a bad feeling however.
please let me know if you need any other information or a picture of the area where i saw this event. also, i forgot to mention that i live on the 20th floor (very top) of a condo building and have a very large terrace which is where i was on this night. the terrace and another balcony i have are on three parts of the building giving me a very wide view of almost the entire skyline.
i view the night sky looking at stars and planets about once or twice a week for the last year and this is the first sighting of a u.F.O. that i've ever seen.
please let me know if you need anything else.

regards,

scott l.

p.S. - i'm 32 years of age, male, and work as a network technician mainly doing contract work.
           i'm not on medication and have never had any mental problems. i was very clear headed
           during this matter.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed a round like object emitting multi colors move strangely over atlanta air force base.

content.detailedDescription: 99.9 percent silent as big as a football field if not bigger
content.summary: Huge black triangle heading from camp lejuene

content.detailedDescription: it was approximately 2 in the morning and i was on cq (charge of quarters) for my company, hhc.  my buddy who was also on duty with me stepped outside for a smoke break and noticed what at first appeared to helicopters doing gun runs in the distance.  he alerted me to this and i came outside to watch as doing so is rather interesting.  it was about 1 minute into it when we noticed that these supposed helicopters were flying way too fast and actually seemed to be "zooming" from left to right at incredibly fast speeds.  they were lit up with what looked to be like red and white lights but at a constant glow, however dimming from time to time.  the thing that freaked me out though was the fact that they were mimicking ah-64 apache attack gun runs!  how a gun run works is they start from the left or the right and swoop down and launch their rockets and what not at a target on the ground.  these objects were doing these same motions from right to left, at what looked to us speeds that definitely cannot be achieved by our aircraft.  they would do these motions one right after the other and sometimes looked as though they were racing!  once one had swooped from the right to left it would fly back from left to right at a vertical zig zag motion, which our aircraft definitely cannot do at the speeds these things were flying.  they continued to do these "gun runs" for about 5-10 minutes and the glow of the ships seemed to pulsate.  our best guess for the distance from us would be about 1-2 miles.  it was a partly cloud night but the craft were well below any clouds.  we both watched this event and were freaked out afterwards because we debunked all possibilities of it being any type of military aircraft.  after about 10 minutes of watching these lights they simply just vanished, almost as if they were never there.  my buddy and i felt uneasy at the fact that we might have just seen ufo's.  i have been in the army for 4 years and have a vast knowledge of our weapons and technology and can honestly say that these lights/ships were not anything human.
content.summary: Two objects chasing one another at fast speeds

content.detailedDescription:
i was at my job, working as security guard, i was sitting down
when i looked up at about a 45 degree angle and somewhat to my left.
it looked like there was something was wrong with the picture. there were
two lights behind the tree branch in front of me.  the lights were like on a police car only they were up in the sky. noticing this i stood up and
walked left away from the trees to get a better view. what i saw was at first i thought was the size of a small airplane. in retrospect, it seemed it was the the size of a stadium at least. it was rectangular the sides were wider than the rest. the middle was black and the rest was white. it looked amber because of the city lights. the running lights were under the belly but i did not see what attached them to the ship.
      i saw it glide west to east then make a mild turn to its right for a couple thousand yards and then head east until i lost sight of it.
       at first i felt i felt good that i had seen it, but after a few seconds i felt like i be put away somewhere or wisked away to to some secret location. so i talked to a contact i know and was made to feel more confident. then i soon got on a computer to report.
content.summary: Usual size, black & white, red & blue lighs underneath

content.detailedDescription:
In the late seventies i was living south texas in a small town with a population of little more than 5,000 people.  i was principal of our county-wide middle-school and the superintendent of schools was my neighbor across the street.  an oilfield worker lived next door to him and the three of us would sometime sit out in our lawn chairs on the superintendent���s driveway chatting and enjoying the cool of the evening.  none of us were drinking. it was a moonless night with no streetlights and the sky was crystal clear. looking into the starry milky way was a beautiful sight.  occasionally we���d spot a satellite inching across the night sky.
the superintendent���s garage was attached to the house by an opened covered walkway about 18 or so feet long. i was sitting facing southwest and had a good view of the sky under and above the walkway.  my neighbors were facing one north and one southeast.
a bright object arose either out of the southern sky or it may have risen from the ground like ball lighting and it arced up and toward the north.  it was shooting out  sparks all around and making a sizzling, rapidly ���shushing��� noise  it appeared to be round and spinning, but i couldn���t be sure of this or of its size and altitude.

it continued rising and arcing north and i lost sight of it momentarily as it passed behind the roof of the covered walkway. i looked straight up to see where it was going but it seemed to have disappeared.  then as i gazed up i realized that there was a long, dark shape visible only because it was silhouetted by the bright starry sky. it was black and as i stared up i became aware of one, then a second large round port very, very dimly lighted.  the sound was the most amazing part in that the dark shape was thrumming so low that i could only feel its vibration in my chest like the lowest notes of a pipe organ or far off thunder.  the vibration was like an idling motor being revved slowly again and again.
i don���t know how long it stayed there but it began to drift slowly toward the west. the impression i got was that it just slid sideways until it dwindled to a dot and was gone. could be that the object remained stationary and the earth rolled away to the east?

the three of us just sat there silently. then i spoke up and said, ���what do you think that was?���  the superintendent replied guardedly, ���i don���t know.���  it was never mentioned again by any of us.  anyone seeing a ufo then or now is usually suspect.

if anyone has had a like experience, i���d like to discuss it with them.
sreyaw610@hotmail.Com.
content.summary: Dull black, very long cigar shape with 2 opaque ports

content.detailedDescription:
At about 9:00 pm last night i stepped outside to smoke my pipe. (i don't smoke in the house.)  i do this a couple of times every night, and usually scan the sky as i'm out, so i'm very familar with what the night sky in my area looks like.  

last night as i was smoking i saw a steady, bright light moving from south to north across the eastern sky at about 45 degrees.  it didn't flash in any way i saw.  i had to step off my porch to follow it as it began to pass behind the trees in my yard.  i followed it until i lost it behind the ridge line to my north.  

i had just returned to my porch and was processing what i had seen, trying to decide what it was, when i glanced up and saw a second light, identical to the first and on the same track.  i had to move off the porch again to follow this one as well, and again i followed it until i lost it over the same ridge, in the same spot, as the first.

these were not like any lights i'm familar with in our sky.  i'm used to seeing planes and aviation lights come and go from nashville international airport 40 miles to our north.  these were not like any of those i have ever seen.  they may have been satellites, although i have seen satellites before in our sky before and these lights i saw were several degrees brighter.  and i have never seen satellites moving on a sraight south to north path before, and i have never seen two following exactly the same path so close in time and space to each other.
content.summary: Saw a steady (non-flashing) light, moving south to north in the eastern sky at about 45 degrees.  less than a minute later saw a second light, identical and following the same path.

content.detailedDescription: In my head i was saying pull over jerry! pull over! as i looked around knowing that we could'nt pull over i bent down to see if it looked like what i saw in 4/28/08 again turn off the light and it was gone.I was excite at first then i got mad. why is this happen to me? why are they letting me see them and then turn out the light.I could'nt sleep last night for thinking about all of this.
content.summary: Headlight's in the sky that what it look

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside on the porch having coffee and a cigarette.
we are approx. 25 miles from charlotte airport an see many
planes decending for a landing or taking off.
i happened to look to the south west over the  roof of the mobile
as something caught my eye i assume.
there were one or two enlongated thin cyndrical objects above the
trees.
it could have been one object due to atmospheric  conditions.
they were bright as if having the sun reflected off of it or them.
they bounced  around for the most part for id say 20 mins max.
the object then sped off and disappeared.
it was a clear morning for the most part.
content.summary: Bright thin cyndrical objects

content.detailedDescription: I  was  coming  home  from evening church service & i saw  a rectangle ufo  with (3) three big  lights on the tail of the ufo signed darryn r. smith aberdeen wash 98520  phone (360)532-0966  p.S. i thought it was so cool.
content.summary: Trianagularmoving@30/35mph

content.detailedDescription: We were on a bow hunting trip in the uintah mountains. we were clmbing up a steep grade(driving)where we were looking up at the stars for a few seconds. noticed a very bright multicolored object coming down at a high rate of speed. during the descent it would produce a tail of lights swithing from red,green blue, yellow in rapid spurts. it came down even with the vehicle and stayed for 10 seconds and shot back out into space diappearing. the lights were too bright to distinguish a shape. i worked on fighter aircraft for several years and during this observation. this was not falling debris of some sort. it literally shot back outto space in a blink of an eye. scared the hell out of me the rest of the trip.
content.summary: Viewed brilliant muti-colored lights descending rapidly, stopped and shot back out to space.

content.detailedDescription: I and my husband was on the way home and it had been raining that day was clouded getting dark i was on my lap top and my husband said what! i look up and all you could see was two huge lights hanging in the air,we were about a mile from it at that time, i said a helicopter kept messing around on laptop.My husband said it not moveing.They he got my attention. we where right at it by this time and notice the huge lights oval shape with rotor blades in front of this craft.This craft was in some cloud's and you just could see it!!!The light's was so bright as i bent my head to see if i could get a better look it turn off it's lights you still could see barely with two small orange lights where the big two oval light was ,then it was gone... this happen on back beach rd in panama city bch  fl
content.summary: Look like helicopter but wasn't had 2 hugh white oval shape lights in front rotor blades  in front .

content.detailedDescription:
This was a good few years ago, about 14 years back, im 26 now, so i was about 12 at the time.
was at my cousin house in hillcrest, a suburb near durban, we had been playing ���1,2,3 block��� running round the house and carrying on for a while, we were still playing as it became dark.

i ran around the garage, and as i came round the corner, i just got a feeling, i cannot explain it, something just told me to look, and as i did, i saw a child sized alien being, just beside the flower bed, as i looked at it, i got the weirdest feeling ever, its was almost like i got a very small nervous shock, my whole body like jolted as i made eye contact with the being, i starred at the alien for a while, about 30secs-1min, shitting myself and not sure what to do, ran away, called me cousins to come look, didn���t say what i had seen, but when i returned with them, there was nothing there anymore. 

the being was small, about 3-4 feet, i could only see the top half, as the rest/ the below half was in the dark (outside light)
its was a purple-blue-black colour, dark, large head with very large eyes.
observing us/me playing in the garden??
content.summary: I saw an alien being, no ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was stargazing with binoculars and found the 10 or so brightest stars to appear with red and green blinking lights. do you have any info on this??
content.summary: Look like stars in the night, but green and red flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to smoke a cigerette at about 1 am on the morning of may 5th.  my patio faces south, and i was looking around the night sky with binoculars (for earlier tonight i had a strange sighting that continued until i arrived home at approx 11 pm, and only ended an hour or so ago *12 am*) and just took notice of all the stars i couldn't see with my naked eye.  venus was at about 10 o clock in my line of sight where i began standing, and i moved to the side of the patio-putting venus at about 1 o clock in my sight.  i had just put the binoculars down when a flash of light, up and to my right, caught my eye.  i quickly looked up and saw a golden/yellow ball of light shot through the night sky-it seemed to maintain direction for a good half second (leaving a trail of light behind it) before quickly slowing down, making a quick 45 degree backwards movement, and shooting back forward and disappearing.  this whole sequence lasted only a few seconds, but the trailing/illuminated light left by this movement formed a slightly angled z shape (if the top and bottom lines were longer and the / was minimally sized at best).  best i can describe it is that it shot through the sky-appearing out of nowhere-and seemed to abruptly slow down before kicking back and shooting away as quickly as it appeared.  i thought initially it to be a meteor-until it made the z kick and shot off into nothingness.

i've seen a few things very recently that have deeply intruiged me, but this was unbelievable.  i also saw something similar (a huge streak of light) that was enormous in comparison-but i can't form the description to make it even remotely believable.  it also occured during a strange night.  over the last 3 weeks or so, there have been a handful of things i planned to report but never felt urged to.  tonight i got on here and immediately reported it (my first one ever!)-thats how incredible this was.  thanks for your time
content.summary: Brilliant golden/yellow streak of light thru sky; appears-makes a z-pattern then disappears in seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck at my apartment and i was looking up at the sky and watching planes and helicopters fly around and make landings at the various airports in the area. i looked up above the tree line and a pulsating white light that was up in the sky. i noticed that everytime that it pulsated it was in a different location in the sky. it was going every which way everytime it would light up again. i continued to watch for about 5 minutes and then it was gone. it was showing up in all different directions and was moving from place to place to fast to be a conventional aircraft from my point of view. don't know what it was but it was interesting.
content.summary: Pulsating white light high in sky. everytime light pulsated it was in another part of the sky!

content.detailedDescription: Noticed unusual star-like flashing object, motionless, it was moonless nite, we see stars a lot here, never seen this...It stayed there for maybe 30 mins, i looked at it thru binoculars, then went to get telescope, tried to lock on it, then it headed west and 2 fast jets headed diectly toward it from milwaukee and it was gone.  this object was high in the sky about 5-10 miles northwest of east troy wisconsin.
content.summary: Starlike bright red / green flashing motionless for 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday, may 4 of 2008, i was at my grandpa house, it was about 9:20pm, and it was pretty dark. so i left the house around that time, and i started my way back home. listening to some music on my way, very distracted, when i suddenly saw some wear object in the sky.
 it is not like those time you look at the sky and see a plain very high. that object i was looking at, was at a very low altitude, and it had a very moderated speed, it waesnt going fast at all. ...I was shock from the first time i saw it....

so i was looking at it while i was driving, and he was in opposite direcion, so he was getting closer to me....So i saw it very clear, very very clear....

i could not believe what my eyes were looking...!!!!! it was kind of a square/rectangle shape, it had 4 lights...One in each corner, it didnt had much color, but a very bright normal white light.

so i turn into a midas or a car repair building i think it it, and i parked there,,and saw it go, then i decided to follow it...

i had my computer laptop full charge in my car, but i thought that the time my computer got completly ready, i would have lost the object...

i decided to follow it,,,but then this big truck got in my way, which the driver was going very slow for some reason, and saw other cars where going slow to.......

and i lost the object....I tried to look for it, remembering the direction it went to, but had no luck.


i was very excited, as i have allways beleive in life outside earth.

i have a google picture of where it was,..
http://img521.Imageshack.Us/img521/8503/callefe7.Jpg

this is how the object looked
http://www.Ufopictures.Info/pictures/triangular-03.Jpg

thanks,,i hope you read

and this is completly real
content.summary: Saw a square shaped ufo in elkhart skies

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a picture of a man standing next to a big tree on the top of a large hill.  i did not notice anything unusual in the sky until i was looking at mt pictures days later.  while i was at knight's ferry park in knight's ferry, ca, i did not see this object with my naked eye,nor did i hear anything unusual.  my main interest for taking the photo was the perspective of the man standing next to the tree.  

upon noticing the object in the picture, i enlarged that portion of the picture as much as i could.  if you notice, the object does not cast a shadow on the hill below leading me to think it is behind the hill not on top of it.  if you look closely, the object appears to be reflecting the sun.  the man on the hill did not appear to notice the object as he and his dog continued their walk along the top of the hill.
content.summary: Appeared in a photo i took at knight's ferry, ca.

content.detailedDescription: no visual siting took place. being irritated by the chem-trails clouding up one of the few sunny days i had seen in some time. i decide i would take picture of the offensive chem-trails.I snapped a few shots standing a few feet into my front yard of the chem-trails.Taking random pictures of the sky and examing them being a mild passtime of mine, i emediately took my digital camera into the house to upload the photos and check them out. the date on my camera is wrong though i dont believe these photos show a date..Im not sure why but it would have been incorrect had it shown at all. i proceeded to peek threw my photos and decide on couple of them to zoom in, attempting to see the jets at the end of the newer trails. i decovered a ufo witch apears to be shadowing one of the jets making the chem-trails. i was thrilled but didn't really do much with the photo past posting it on myspace. my mother suggested just this morning 5/4/08 that i submit my photo to you at mufon. so here it is. i'm aware this isn't a siting description but it does atleast explain how i came about taking the photo.
content.summary: While taking pictures of chem-trails in my front yard i aparently photographed a ufo .

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside and noticed some quick movement in the sw sky.  i wasn't sure so i continued to watch.  it was amazing in that it was making quick zig zag movements.  i got binoculars.  now i could see the lights clearly and there were bright red, green and white lights.  i could not see enough detail to describe the ufo.  i went back into the house to tell my wife and got a second set of binoculars for her to watch.  she also saw it.  i watched for another 1/2 hour.  it kept making the same movements and it was fading into the distance and i quit watching.

i have seen the ufo on several subsequent nights.
content.summary: Bright red, green and white lights making quick irregular movements

content.detailedDescription: On december 19, 1989 at approximately 7:15 pm, i and another person witnessed an unusual aireal event 25 miles north of las vegas. sky was clear at the time and sunlight was starting to recede, so timeline may not be exact. we were traveling from los angeles in route to aspen, colorado. i was a driving a 28 foot u-haul truck, loaded with luggage and christmas decorations for employer's winter home in aspen. we pulled off on the north bound shoulder of interstate 15 to change driving positions as i wanted to drink a cup of coffee. we both moved to the rear of the truck, and at the rear of the vehicle i caught a flashing red light in my view. the light was a single light, approximately 5000' in altitude, appeared stationary, distance 2 miles, southeast of our position. within 15-20 seconds a second light appeared, spaced north of first light at same altitude. the second light did not flash, and was close in distance to first light. the first light stopped flashing and remained constant, as the second. when the first light stopped flasing, a third light appeared, and than a fourth, each lighting several seconds after the previous, and all remaining lit, no flashing. within a minute or so a total of 12 lights were visible, all evenly spaced, and all red in color. the distance from the first light to the last, appeared to be a mile or so in length. the lights remained at altitude and did not appear to be moving laterally. in short order we heard the sound of a jet aircraft, but i could not get a vector on the noise. as i turned back to the lights, the first light that appeared flashed several times, and disappeared. the remaining lights than moved from a linear formation south to north, and rotated to north/east - south/west direction. as they moved it appeared that the formation was in a v pattern, with the point facing south/east. the lights appeared to now be moving south/east towards the colorado river area. the jet noise became increasingly louder, and we observed two f-15 fighter aircraft moving at a very high rate of speed. the aircraft crossed in front of our vehicle, traveling south/east and vectored directly toward the lights. i am very familiar with aircraft types, and these aircraft had twin vertical tail sections as found on usaf f-15 fighters. the aircraft closed quickly on the lights and than the red lights moved in unison at an extremely high rate of speed away from f-15's in a south/easterly direction, and disappeared in short order. the fighters' lights could be visble for a short period there after, however it was quite evident that the f-15's were considerably slower than the v-shapped light formaton. shortly after fighters' lights disappeared we heard several loud booms, which we assumed were sonic booms. the experience was quite stunning, and later that evening we made a call from our motel room in st. george, utah to nellis afb. my partner made the call and transferred to base operations. they seemed disinterested, and stated that they could not comment on military flight operations, but suggested that we contact the faa in regards to the red lights.
content.summary: Red lights observed approximately 25 miles north of las vegas

content.detailedDescription: We were heading to cripple creek and on hy 50 right be fore the turn off to hy 9 we saw some objects high up above the mountain on the right hand side toward the west with 2 towers on top.  there were ii lager objects in a semi circle formation flashing in and out of site in about 10 second intervals.  they were not moving but would appear and then disappear.  we watch them appear for about 30 secs-60 secs then they would disappear and then reappear.  we watch this happen about 6 times then they were gone.  we were so excited we missed our turn off and had to come back. upon returning to hy 9 we then noticed two fighter jets flying over the 2 towers were we just witnessed the ufos 10 minutes earlier.  on the way home that evening we were on hy 67 heading to 50 west and were watching the sky about 830 pm and my husbang kept saying that there was something wierd in the sky it kinda looked like a planet but was larger and bright green.  i told him to pull over to get a better look we open the driver door and he pointed it out to me.  it flashed a couple times then shrinked down to a pin point and was gone this happen in a bout 50 seconds!  yes i was very happy to return home after that.  then the follwing thursday my daughter called me stating she saw a ufo in wi she emailed me the pictures she took on her phone.  i will share these with you.  what is going on?  why so many sightings in such a short period?
content.summary: 11 objects in sky in a semi circle formation flashing in and out clear day

content.detailedDescription: My daughter emailed me these photos she took with her cell phone.  they were riding down county y between pestigo and oconto.  thay looked in a field and saw lights on the object in the back of the field.  it was right of above the tree line it made no sound and did not move.  they locked the doors rolled down the window to take pictures and left.  they were afraid and came dirctly home.  it was about 300 ft long.
content.summary: Could see lights

content.detailedDescription: On a summer day me and a friend went dirt bike riding we got on a trail i was leading.  in a clearing i saw a white object,about five feet tall and 3 feet wide gently boucing up and down, but was about 1 foot above the ground.  i stop and looked back at my friend and she stopped the same time as i staring at the objects then realizing there were 2 of them. we watched them staying in the same position boucing up and down then they moved sideways into the woods' we decided to ride down and investigate and could not find anything.  the next day i return alone and rode down the same trail but about a quarter of a mile from the oridginal sighting we saw the day before there was a ship.  it was about 20feet from the trail in the woods.  it was camoflaged, 10 feet in radius and i stilts about 6 feet tall.  this i did not investigate i was alone but i rode through the trail and seem to remember that it took alot longer then normal.  to this day i dont understand why i didnt go back to the rode because it was a shorter distance i know i was very frightened.  the next day my father came with be to the area of the place i saw the ship.  he said thay was something there cause all the brush was packed down.
content.summary: Riding dirt bikes 2 objects caught our attention in a clearing about 100 yards in front of us next day i return to  that area and seen a  craft back in the woods.

content.detailedDescription: I, went outside at 10:52 on may 3rd, 2008, and looked to the location in the sky where i had viewed two starlike objects flashing from red to green on three different nights(the previous time being on april 30th from 10:15 to 10:30(when both objects dissappeared). i had my husband, come outside to show him that there was nothing in the sky where we had viewed the objects, out of the corner of my eye, i saw a red to green flashing star-like object. the object was far to the right from where we had seen them before.  we called our son, out to see this.  this time we could only find one of the starlike objects. tyler was scarred and excited. we watched this object move around, moving suddenly from left to right, right to left, moving what seemed closer to us(the colors would get brighter)and then farther away. we watched this happen until 11:00pm. and then it got really dim and dissappeared. i went in to see what time this was. i went back outside and as quick as it dissappeared it reappeared. it did this quite a few times. scott went inside and went to bed about 11:30 and tyler and i came back inside at 11:45, and went to bed. i tried to take photos, but when i downloaded the 3 pics, it showed nothing but blackness.
content.summary: Red to green flashing starlike object moving, object dissappearing then reappearing

content.detailedDescription: I work for a large police dept and i am up early to get ready for my shift.  i went outside to go to my car to retrieve my coffee mug.  i looked up at the sky to see if was clear with stars. it was about 05:25 a.M.? just before sunrise. just before i looked down a light appeared in the west.  the light was at a very high altitude maybe 30,000 feet, and at first looked like normal aircraft.  i then realized its light looked alot bigger and brighter for such a high object.  the light was circular to oval in shape and was traveling from west to east across the sky. i would estimate speed 700-900 mph. i have lived or worked off and on all my life in the flight landing paths of major airports and currently work next to one. this light had no green or red running lights.  the light source was not multiple bright landing lights seen on many large aircraft. i live in a very quiet redwood forest and this object made no noise.  thought possible satellite catching sunrise but light didnt look like a reflection and it didn't dissapate. maybe military flight? don't know, thought worth sharing in case tied in with any other reports.
content.summary: Single bright light travels east across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This actually happened to me twice. once when i was laying down watching the stars and another time (ironically) when i was watching the stars and explaining to someone what i had seen the first time i saw ufo's.

the first time: i was sitting on a car and looking up in the sky for about ten minutes. i became fixated on one star that had seemed to move but i was not sure. i told my friend to watch it with me. as we looked at it. it split into 4 seperate stars and shot into 4 differnet directions. keeping an eye on one of them and some times each of them..They each moved in crazy directions like they were bouncing around the sky..Then they each came back together and hovered around each other for a few seconds as to communicate with one another.. then they again shot into 4 different directions and each one disapearing. ther was no beam of light coming from them..It was not like a beam at all.. it was crazy. i was not surprised and neither was my friend just truly amazed.
the second time i saw this a few years later in 1996in west chester , pa. ironically when i was trying to explain to someone who was a skeptic what had happened the first time..We looked up in the heavens and i saw another strange looking star...I told my friend that it looked like the one i saw before...He was a total disbeliever..Then strangely enough the same exact sequence of events happened again...My friend to this day is in shock about it.....I was just lucky to have experienced the same thing twice..But since then i have been looking with no luck!
content.summary: One birght star split into 4 and went crazily/speraticaly in oposite directions vary fast

content.detailedDescription:
Object spoted north of mckinney about 7:20 pm on may-02-08  
the picture of the object - which i refered to as maybe a jet plane and vapor trail,  was not the object i saw.  but was taken almost imediatlly after i lost sight of the origanal object.  the picture was of an object traveling from south to north.  it seem intresting enough to post as it did not quite look like a jet. and it was at a high altitude.  i am going to take some pictures of jets with cem-trails and see if it is just my camera making them look like that or maybe she did take a picture of something different.
content.summary: Mckinney re - white sphere traveling from north to south
